page.title: 03Printing and Book-binding
page.content: William Clowes is a printing and book-binding factory.They have four-hundred and sixty-five people working there in different departments,for instance, the offices, litho,bindery,readers and computers. Many people in Beccles have relatives working there.William Clowes prints many expensive,high quality books such as law books.Examples of well-known books are Guinness Book of Records,Hymns Ancient and Modern,Beatrix Potter and Who's Who. William Clowes is the biggest industry in Beccles and is part of the McCorquadale Group of companies. Printing is done by the most modern computer methods.They print more than ten million books each year.
